title: When I am on the direct call / media call then my speakerphone does not work it's very low volume
content: When I make a call on speakerphone or receive a call on media or direct calls and I turn the speaker on to hear it is very low volume but on the other side the others can hear me very loud and clear but on my side I can barely hear them or it's on just very soft or low volume I've tried everything switching on off the phone and no Bluetooth and all the other things I have been reading but nothing has worked please help if you can
